data_table.description: Subject ID, race, ethnicity, sex, age of Parkinson disease onset, asymmetric onset, bradykinesia, resting tremor, postural instability, ridgidity, gait difficulties, supranuclear gaze palsy, dysautonomia, memory loss, activation tremor, oculagyric crisis, Hoehn and Yahr score, history of stroke, head injury, encephalitis, hallucinations, and smoking status of participants with family history of Parkinson disease.

variable.name: SUBJID
variable.description: Unique, de-identified ID number

variable.name: YOB
variable.description: Year of birth of subject

variable.name: SEX
variable.description: Sex of subject

variable.name: AOO
variable.description: Age of onset of Parkinson disease symptoms

variable.name: ASYMMETRIC_ONSET
variable.description: Does the subject have a history of or present at this visit with the following signs or symptoms? [Asymmetric onset of symptoms]

variable.name: BRADYKINESIA
variable.description: Does the subject have a history of or present at this visit with the following signs or symptoms? [Bradykinesia]

variable.name: RESTING_TREMOR
variable.description: Does the subject have a history of or present at this visit with the following signs or symptoms? [Resting tremor]

variable.name: POSTURAL_INSTABILITY
variable.description: Does the subject have a history of or present at this visit with the following signs or symptoms? [Postural instability]

variable.name: RIDGIDITY
variable.description: Does the subject have a history of or present at this visit with the following signs or symptoms? [Rigidity]

variable.name: GAIT_DIFFICULTIES
variable.description: Does the subject have a history of or present at this visit with the following signs or symptoms? [Gait difficulties]

variable.name: MARKED_DOP_REPLACEMENT_RESPONSE
variable.description: Does the subject have a history of or present at this visit with the following signs or symptoms? [Marked response to dopamine replacement]

variable.name: STROKE_OR_STEPWISE
variable.description: Does the subject have a history of or present at this visit with the following signs or symptoms? [Stroke or stepwise progression]

variable.name: HEAD_INJURY
variable.description: Does the subject have a history of or present at this visit with the following signs or symptoms? [Head injury]

variable.name: ENCEPHALITIS
variable.description: Does the subject have a history of or present at this visit with the following signs or symptoms? [Encephalitis]

variable.name: OCULAGYRIC_CRISIS
variable.description: Does the subject have a history of or present at this visit with the following signs or symptoms? [Oculogyric crisis]

variable.name: SUSTAINED_REMISSION
variable.description: Does the subject have a history of or present at this visit with the following signs or symptoms? [Sustained remission]

variable.name: SUPEANUCLEAR_GAZE_PALSY
variable.description: Does the subject have a history of or present at this visit with the following signs or symptoms?: Supranuclear Gaze Palsy

variable.name: CEREBELLAR_SIGNS
variable.description: Does the subject have a history of or present at this visit with the following signs or symptoms?: Cerebellar Signs

variable.name: NEUROLEPTIC_TMT_AT_SYMPTOM_ONSET
variable.description: Does the subject have a history of or present at this visit with the following signs or symptoms?

variable.name: DYSAUTONOMIA
variable.description: Does the subject have a history of or present at this visit with the following signs or symptoms? [Dysautonomia]

variable.name: MemoryLoss
variable.description: Does the subject have a history of or present at this visit with the following signs or symptoms? [Memory Loss]

variable.name: ACTIVATION_TREMOR
variable.description: Does the subject have a history of or present at this visit with the following signs or symptoms? [Activation tremor]

variable.name: HALLUCINATIONS
variable.description: Does the subject have a history of or present at this visit with the following signs or symptoms?: Hallucinations

variable.name: HANDEDNESS
variable.description: Subject's report of handedness

variable.name: SMOKING_HISTORY
variable.description: Subject's report of smoking history

variable.name: MMSE
variable.description: Subject's Mental Status Exam score

variable.name: H_and_Y
variable.description: Subject's Hoehn and Yahr score

variable.name: Ethnicity
variable.description: Ethnicity of subject

variable.name: Race
variable.description: Race of subject
